hero.title: Transform Any Input into Astonishing 3D Objects
hero.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform converts your images, text descriptions, or sketches into stunning 3D models in seconds.

methods.title: Generation Methods
methods.subtitle: Our AI can generate 3D objects from virtually any type of input you provide.

image_to_3d.title: Image to 3D
image_to_3d.description: Upload an image, and our AI will generate a detailed 3D model based on it.

text_to_3d.title: Text to 3D
text_to_3d.description: Describe what you want in natural language and watch our AI bring your ideas to life.
text_to_3d.input_text: A futuristic robot with cybernetic details

unique_to_3d.title: Unique to 3D
unique_to_3d.description: Specialized method for unique or complex objects that require a custom approach.

text_to_image_to_3d.title: Text to Image to 3D
text_to_image_to_3d.description: Describe your idea in text, convert it to an image, and then generate a 3D model.
text_to_image_to_3d.input_text: A dragon flying over a mountain

multi_image_to_3d.title: Multi-image to 3D
multi_image_to_3d.description: Provide several images from different angles to create a more accurate and detailed 3D model.

sketch_to_3d.title: Sketch to 3D
sketch_to_3d.description: Draw a simple sketch, and our AI will transform it into a fully realized 3D object.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Our advanced AI makes creating 3D objects simple and intuitive.

step1.title: Upload or Create
step1.description: Upload an image, write a description, or draw a sketch of what you want to create.

step2.title: AI Processing
step2.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your input and generates a detailed 3D model in real-time.

step3.title: Download and Use
step3.description: Download your 3D model in various formats for use in games, AR/VR, printing, and more.

benefits.title: Benefits of Our Platform
benefits.subtitle: Discover why professionals and enthusiasts choose our technology for their 3D creation needs.

item1.title: Save Time
item1.description: Stop spending days modeling. 3D can be done in just a few minutes using our AI.

item2.title: Intuitive Interface
item2.description: Simple and intuitive interface. No need to become an expert in modeling or prompts.

item3.title: Flexible Export
item3.description: Export your 3D model as an OBJ or GLB file for seamless use wherever you want.

item4.title: Storage
item4.description: Generate the 3D object you need and save it in our database for future use.

item5.title: Multiple Styles
item5.description: Choose from various styles like Anime, Pixar, Disney, Realistic, Chibi to customize your 3D creations.

item6.title: Texture Extraction
item6.description: Download and use the AI-generated textures for your projects. Ideal for game developers and 3D designers.

cta.title: Ready for your AI partner to generate unique 3D objects?

footer.title: START YOUR ADVENTURE
footer.subtitle: Start generating unique 3D objects from the text or image you provide as input.

error_view.title: Error Loading
error_view.not_found_title: Document not available or not found.

tutorials_page.title: Tutorials
tutorials_page.subtitle: Discover our collection of tutorials designed to help you master Instant3D.

empty.title: No tutorials available yet
empty.subtitle: We are working on new content. Check back soon!

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Log in to access your platform.

register.title: Sign Up
register.subtitle: Enter your details to create your account

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a reset link
reset_password.spam_note: Can't find the email? Check your spam folder

change_password.title: Reset Password
change_password.subtitle: Enter a new secure password for your account.

verify_email.title: Check your email
verify_email.subtitle: We've sent you a verification link
verify_email.instructions: Click the link we just sent you to verify your account and continue.

action_handler.success_subtitle: Your account has been verified correctly.

correct_email.success_subtitle: Your account has been activated correctly.

modals.registration_required_text: It seems you are new here. To continue, please complete your registration.
modals.requirements_subtitle: Your password must meet the following requirements:
modals.req_uppercase: Include at least one uppercase letter (A-Z)
modals.req_lowercase: Include at least one lowercase letter (a-z)
modals.req_special: Contain at least one special character (!@#$...)

visualizer_page.title: My Objects
visualizer_page.subtitle: Welcome to your 3D creation space. Here you can manage and visualize your AI-generated 3D models. Explore the different categories and access your objects quickly and easily.

history.empty: You haven't generated any objects in this category yet.
history.delete_confirm_prefix: Are you sure you want to delete
history.delete_confirm_generic: Are you sure you want to delete this generation?
history.delete_success: The object has been successfully deleted.

tutorial_dash_page.title: Tutorials
tutorial_dash_page.subtitle: Learn to create amazing 3D models with our step-by-step tutorials. From basic concepts to advanced techniques, find everything you need.

empty.title: No tutorials available
empty.subtitle: Tutorials are being prepared. Check back soon to access educational content on 3D generation.

config_dash_page.title: Settings
config_dash_page.subtitle: Manage your personal profile and account settings. Here you can update your information, change your profile picture, and manage your Instant3D account.

profile_image.title: Profile Picture
profile_image.description: Update your profile picture to personalize your account

username.title: Username
username.description: The username you used to register on the platform

email.title: Email Address
email.description: The email address used to register with Instant3D
email.cannot_change: The email address cannot be changed

danger_zone.title: Danger Zone
danger_zone.description: Permanently delete your account. This action is irreversible and will remove all your data, models, and settings.
danger_zone.delete_modal_message: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

common.details_placeholder_generic: e.g., flying over snowy peak, sunset
common.drag_and_drop_prompt: Drag an image or click to upload
common.drag_and_drop_views: Drag or click to upload the view
common.operation_takes_time: This operation may take several minutes.

results.instructions: Your 3D model will appear here once generated

model_viewer.waiting_subtitle: Your 3D model will appear here once generated

error_boundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
error_boundary.subtitle: An unexpected error occurred in the application. Please try refreshing the page.
